page.title: 02One week in Fauldhouse 1985
page.content: Due to the decline in audiences the {Savoy Cinema }has fallen into disuse and has now been demolished. The old police station is being turned into an{information service office. {Park View Victoria F. C. }have donated Â£300 to the Gala Day. In April 1985 the record number of{blood donors was 214.{Toddlers' clothes }will be on sale in the church hall. The 11{community councillors}have been automatically nominated until May 1989. The manager of the {community {centre}is organising things to do for girls ages 15-18.Longridge school will be ten years on{May,9. The winner of the{Ridge Hotel}Pool Trophy was Bill Gray.The power lifting club are holding a {sponsored walk}of thirty miles in aid of funds.
